#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define ll long long
#define pb push_back
#define f first
#define s second
typedef pair<int,int> ii;
typedef pair<int,pair<int,int> > iii;

void build_z(string s1, int Z[])
{
    int n = s1.length();
    int l=0,r=0,i;
    
    for(i=1;i<n;i++)
    {
        if(i>r)
        {
            l=i;
            r=i;
            while(r<n && s1[r-l]==s1[r])
                r++;
            
            Z[i]=r-l;
            r--;
        }
        
        else
        {
            if(Z[i-l]<r-i+1)
                Z[i]=Z[i-l];
            else
            {
                l = i;
                while(r<n && s1[r-l]==s1[r])
                    r++;
                Z[i]=r-l;
                r--;
            }
        }
    }
    
}

int main(int argc, const char * argv[])
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);
    
    int n,k,i,counter=0,maxlen=-1,maxz=0,pos=0,C[1000005];
    string str1,str2;
    int Z[1000001]={0};
    
    cin>>n>>str1>>k;
    
    fill(C,C+n+1,0);
    build_z(str1,Z);
    
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        C[Z[i]]++;
    
    for(i=n-2;i>=0;i--)
        C[i]=C[i]+C[i+1];
    
    
    for(i=0;i<=n;i++)
        if(C[i]+1>=k)
        {
            maxz=i;
        }
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        if(Z[i]==maxz)
            pos = i;
    }
    
    cout<<maxz<<"\n"<<str1.substr(pos,maxz)<<"\n";
    
    return 0;
}
